titleStmt.title: A Serious and faithfull representation of the judgements of ministers of the gospell within the province of London. Contained in a letter from them to the generall and his counsel of warre./ Delivered to his excellency by some of the subscribers, Jan. 18. 1649.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: by M.B. for Samuel Gellibrand, and Ralph Smith,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Your servants in the Lord, Tho. Gataker, Pastor of Rotherhith, et. al.
Reproduction of original in: University of London. Library.
